section.heading: Property tax treatment of transportable factory-built housing units.

content.p: 59-2-1503. Property tax treatment of transportable factory-built housing units. Regardless of whether a transportable factory-built housing unit is considered to be real property or personal property under Section 70D-2-401 , for purposes of this chapter: (1) a transportable factory-built housing unit that is located in a transportable factory-built housing unit park: (a) except as provided in Subsection (1)(b) , is considered to be personal property; and (b) notwithstanding Subsection (1)(a) , is considered to be real property if the owner of the transportable factory-built housing unit owns the real property upon which the transportable factory-built housing unit is located; and (2) a transportable factory-built housing unit that is not located in a transportable factory-built housing unit park: (a) except as provided in Subsection (2)(b) , is considered to be personal property; and (b) notwithstanding Subsection (2)(a) , is considered to be real property if the transportable factory-built housing unit is an improvement.
